span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 使解脱，摆脱： to free or remove from an entanglement or difficulty
【例】 extricate himself from financial difficulties 使他摆脱财政困境
【近】 disengage, disentangle, free, liberate, release, untangle
【反】 enmesh, entangle, embroil 卷入
【记】 ex + tric 复杂；ex 出 + trick 诡计，诀窍 从诡计中脱出来
【另】 from ex- "out of" + tricae (plural) "perplexities混乱, hindrances阻碍,"
